attributes.action: IS BRITISH MEMBERS TO BE STRIPPED OF THEIR RIGHTS TO LIVE IN BRITAIN
attributes.additional_details: we the undersigned wish the government to create laws which state that British people who join the ISLAMIC STATE be stripped of their rights to live in the United Kingdom.... People of the UK do not wish hard earned money to be wasted of de radialisation or any other treatment and wish that these people remain outside of the UK to keep our own country safe.   Also people who leave the UK to join IS should be treated like all other terrorists and be removed from the UK immediately
